TopicTitle: Stuck with the above posters avatar (Redux)

Articles.Content: i look at the squished grumpy cat inside the elevator and just wait for a janitor with a mop and then walk in and carry on
I materialize on floor 28 and give the other astronaut a wave.
i wave at the other astronaut as i hack into my helmet's HUD to watch Gravity
I see someone who has left my SOI several times.
At floor 31 I see someone who I crashed into too much.
At floor 32, i see something strange that needs further analysis. Calling science team...
at floor 33, i call NASA reporting that i see an alien but then they tell me to just hush and ignore
At floor 34, I wave heartily at the other person in the spacesuit.
At floor 35, i see an astronaut without his helmet. PUT THAT BACK ON, YOU'RE NOT ON MY SURFACE!!!!!
At floor 36, i see Kerbin has a impact trajectory with me. Bummer.
At floor 37, i see a strange walking mushroom. I just ignore it and mind my own business.
On floor 38, I see an alien, and begin to study it from afar.
on floor 39, i see another astronaut which prompted me to give a salute

This thread needs reviving.

Hi there!
on floor 41 i notice we miss a floor and trhow some beer with bear on their product label as a decoy to the previous and next poster
on floor 42, i knock off the beer an look at the weird floating logo that appears before me

On floor 43, I see an obese stormtrooper. I ask him how he ruined his life joining the enemies, and he slowly moans:

"Their pizza is really good."

on floor 44, i see nothing but i feel presence that thinks i am a stormtrooper and obese which i am neither as i am an astronaut and this suit uses lots of air to inflate plus its a bad angle in the photo *cries in a corner*

I enter the elevator on floor 45 and notice Santa wearing an spacesuit crying in the corner. I kick him in the stomach just for fun, then kill him with the Schwartz. I then press the button for floor 47

Entering the elevator on floor 46. This guy dressed in black is holding his hand infront of his eyes like something is blinding him. I feel everything is melting around me. Pressing the button for floor 48.

I enter on floor 47 and I'm immediately blinded. I yell out loud: "Holy *censored* *censored*, stop that *censored*! Consider the following - there are other people on this *censored* lift besides you, *censored*, get the *censored* off!" I then press the button for floor 49.

AS I get back in the elevator at floor 48 (after running my errand on floor 47), I see a man wearing a horse head. I don't like horses. I press all the buttons in the elevator, as I am only going to the next floor.
hmm its dark helmet, maybe i can tell him that this elevator will go at ludicrous speed on the way up to make him leave
I get on the elevator on floor 50...and scream "BUMMMMP" at an astronaut for no real reason
I arrive at floor 51 and show off my ability to survive in extreme pressures and temperatures. As well as my thick Russian accent.
